topic.title: Zeromail working?
topic.body: The echobot isn't returning any messages. is it just me?

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: hell yeah, I hope this blows up.

1_1FJFF8d4B5LQ9jJinqBRxqCR7RHbHPxBfv.body:
> [xp](#comment_4_1EbkgVAJKgrTeYAmF3FSEJ8dRabpWH87it): so is it still working or not?
Zeromail is working fine, the echobot isn't.

1_16irrH5hRDUX3nrY71JFrRChNEr5p9b6jS.body:
I don't really understand the Tor thing here. 
If I use zeronet with "Tor always on", how do I get the Tor browser to work? Everything works fine with Tor always on.
Right now, zeronet uses my default browser, which is not the Tor browser.

> [nippletwister](#comment_114_1PvAyLAB5H1JKbiFjx95ZJXrNJVyWxs5Hf): Check out this
> Yes, you can also use it in Tor browser, to make it work you need to go to about:preferences#advanced > Settings... > And add 127.0.0.1 to No Proxy for field

thanks, nt ;)
